name: Lenovo Laptop
desc: Sleek and lightweight design ideal for portability.
Powerful processor and 16GB of RAM for multitasking.
14-inch HD display with vibrant colour clarity.
512GB SSD for fast storage and quick boot times.
Up to 10 hours of battery life on a single charge.

name: Motorola
desc: 6.5-inch high-resolution touchscreen display.
Dual-camera system with advanced photo modes.
Fast processor and 5G connectivity.
128GB storage with expandable memory option.
Fingerprint scanner and facial recognition security.

name: Microsoft Surface
desc: 10-inch full HD screen perfect for movies and reading.
Lightweight and easy to carry on the go.
Supports stylus input for drawing and note-taking.
Quad-speaker setup for rich audio experience.
Long battery life and fast USB-C charging.

name: Apple iPhone 16 Pro
desc: 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion.
Triple-lens camera system with LiDAR for night mode portraits.
A17 Bionic chip for unmatched speed and efficiency.
Dynamic Island for seamless multitasking.
Ceramic Shield and water resistance for durability.

name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra
desc: 6.8-inch QHD+ AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate.
Quad camera system with 200MP main sensor.
S Pen included for precision input.
1TB storage option and 5G connectivity.
Massive battery with ultra-fast charging support.

name: Apple iPad Air
desc: 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display with True Tone.
M2 chip for blazing-fast performance and multitasking.
Supports Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.
All-day battery life for work and play.
Advanced 12MP front and rear cameras for video calls and photos.

name: Dyson V8 Handstick Vacuum
desc: Cord-free and lightweight design for easy maneuvering.
Up to 40 minutes of fade-free suction power.
Powerful motor for deep cleaning on carpets and hard floors.
Easily converts to a handheld for quick spot cleans.
Includes multiple attachments for versatile use.

name: Eufy Clean Robovac L60 SES with Auto Empty Station
desc: Smart navigation with laser mapping for efficient cleaning.
Auto-empty base for hands-free dirt disposal.
Quiet operation and strong suction for all floor types.
Wi-Fi connectivity with app and voice control support.
Ideal for pet hair and daily maintenance cleaning.

name: Dyson V15s Detect Submarine
desc: Detects and highlights hidden dust with laser tech.
Advanced filtration traps 99.99% of microscopic particles.
Submarine wet roller head for vacuuming and mopping.
LCD screen shows real-time performance stats.
Run time up to 60 minutes with smart battery management.
